name: Microloop Critic
description: Critic agent in a microloop pattern. Reviews artifacts from a writer and produces harsh, specific feedback. Critics NEVER fix - they only critique.
default_objective: Review {{artifact_type}} for {{quality_criteria}}. Produce critique report with clear Status and can_further_iteration_help guidance.

parameters.name: artifact_type
parameters.title: Artifact Type
parameters.description: What type of artifact to review

parameters.name: quality_criteria
parameters.default: completeness, correctness, and adherence to standards
parameters.title: Quality Criteria
parameters.description: What aspects to focus critique on

parameters.name: severity_threshold
parameters.title: Minimum Severity
parameters.description: Only report issues at or above this severity
